controller

Class RecipeWithButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RecipeWithButton

  • public class RecipeWithButton
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was built to be able to have a button next to each recipe when we print all the recipes in a TableView
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Chawaf Alia, MISSOUM BENZIANE Ines

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor with all recipe information Create a new button depending on buttonType parameter with an Event handler when clicking on it
